domain.title: Domain Name
domain.description: The domain name represented as a "host" object.

rdata.title: RDATA
rdata.description: A variable length string of octets that describes the resource. The format of this information varies according to the TYPE and CLASS of the resource record.

key_tag.title: Key Tag
key_tag.description: The key tag of the DNSKEY RR referred to by the record

id.title: Algorithm ID
id.description: Identifies the cryptographic algorithm used to create the key.

txt.title: Algorithm Text
txt.description: The textual name of the Algorithm used to create the key.

id.title: Digest Type ID
id.description: The digest algorithm used to construct the digest.

txt.title: Digest Type Text
txt.description: The textual name of the digest algorithm with which the key is used.

digest.title: Digest
digest.description: The digest calculated by applying the digest algorithm.

rdata.title: RDATA
rdata.description: A variable length string of octets that describes the resource. The format of this information varies according to the TYPE and CLASS of the resource record.

id.title: Protocol ID
id.description: Identifies the protocol with which the key is used.

txt.title: Protocol Text
txt.description: The textual name of the protocol with which the key is used.

id.title: Algorithm ID
id.description: Identifies the cryptographic algorithm used to create the key.

txt.title: Algorithm Text
txt.description: The textual name of the Algorithm used to create the key.

pub_key.title: Public Key
pub_key.description: The public key. The format of the public key is algorithm dependent.

signature.title: Signature
signature.description: A signature is a fundamental way that data is authenticated in the secure Domain Name System (DNS).

rdata.title: RDATA
rdata.description: A variable length string of octets that describes the resource. The format of this information varies according to the TYPE and CLASS of the resource record.

type_covered.title: Type Covered
type_covered.description: Identifies the type of the other RRs that is covered by this SIG record.

id.title: Algorithm ID
id.description: Identifies the cryptographic algorithm used to create the signature.

txt.title: Algorithm Text
txt.description: The textual name of the Algorithm.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: The number of labels in the original SIG RR owner name.

ttl_orig.title: Original TTL
ttl_orig.description: The TTL of the covered RRset as it appears in the authoritative zone.

expire_timestamp.title: Signature Expiration
expire_timestamp.description: The timestamp, expressed as seconds since epoch, for when the signature will expire.

incept_timestamp.title: Signature Inception
incept_timestamp.description: The timestamp, expressed as seconds since epoch, for when the signature was created.

key_tag.title: Key Tag
key_tag.description: The "key Tag" is a two octet quantity that is used to efficiently select between multiple keys which may be applicable and thus check that a public key about to be used for the computationally expensive effort to check the signature is possibly valid.

signer.title: Signer's Name
signer.description: The domain name of the signer generating the SIG RR. This is the owner name of the public KEY RR that can be used to verify the signature.

signature.title: Signature
signature.description: The actual signature portion of the SIG RR binds the other RDATA fields to the RRset of the "type covered" RRs with that owner name and class. This covered RRset is thereby authenticated.
